title: Just Hello
content:
Hi all,  
I’m new around here, and just wanted to stick my ugly head in and say hello. I’ll be graduating in May with a bachelors in design, and am looking for some new reading material & influences. Was wondering if anyone has any specific recommendations of things to check out, inside or out of this site.  
Thanks,  
Aspiring type geek.

 [‹ How is body size determined for fonts?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208042925/http:/typophile.com/node/19130 "Go to previous forum topic") [Ruari McLean, 1917-2006 ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208042925/http:/typophile.com/node/18991 "Go to next forum topic")
author: v-six

comments.content: This place is like a good library. Search and you’ll get some answers.

\>This place is like a good library.

don’t speak too loudly or the librarian will tell you off ;-)

Welcome.
Thanks for the welcomes. There’s nothing like a good library. Are there late fees?

There is only the nominal psychic surcharge. It’s amortized…

Welcome.

peace

Hello,  
 [Wiki](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208042925/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Books) not all of them have an entry yet.  
 [Triumvirate](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208042925/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Triumvirate).  
Tim
